entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:16 AM EST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 07:16 AM EST Wednesday 15 March 2023
